findings.title: Incorrect fee amount taken
findings.description: Ecosystem fee is taken with marketing fee value instead of the correct fee amount.

findings.title: Potential out-of-gas exception
findings.description: The function includeToWhiteList() may run out of gas if there is a long list of addresses.

findings.title: Excessive owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has various permissions that could be exploited, such as changing fees, withdrawing tokens, and blacklisting addresses.
findings.location: Various functions related to owner privileges
